location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Secret Letters received by way of Marseilles June 15.1855’

mods.abstract: This bundle consists of summaries, and partial transcripts, of secret letters received from both the President in Council (3 May 1855, Number 28) and the Government of Bombay (11 May 1855, Numbers 35-37). The amount of detail for each entry therefore varies.The letter from the President in Council (folios 115-116r) conveys updates from the Punjab and news related to the Anglo-Afghan Treaty of Friendship.The section from Bombay (folio 116v) consists of brief updates on Aden, Turkish Arabia, and the Somali Expedition.

name.namePart: President and Governor of Bombay in Council
